trans-unit.source: Contains values used as identifiers by <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider"></xref>.
These identifiers are used by UI Automation providers.
UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent fields in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern>.
Identifies the event raised when an item is added to a collection of selected items.

If the result of an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider.AddToSelection%2A> call is a single selected item, then an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers.ElementSelectedEvent> must be raised instead.
This identifier is used by UI Automation providers.
UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern>.
Identifies the event raised when an item is removed from a collection of selected items.

If the result of a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider.RemoveFromSelection%2A> call is a single selected item, then an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers.ElementSelectedEvent> will be raised instead.
This identifier is used by UI Automation providers.
UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern>.
Identifies the event that is raised when a single item is selected (causing all previously selected items to become deselected).

If the result of either an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider.AddToSelection%2A> or a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider.RemoveFromSelection%2A> call is more than one selected item, then an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers.ElementAddedToSelectionEvent> or <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers.ElementRemovedFromSelectionEvent> event is raised.
This identifier is used by UI Automation providers.
UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern>.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider.IsSelected"></xref> property.
This identifier is used by UI Automation providers.
UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern>.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern"></xref> pattern.
This identifier is used by UI Automation providers.
UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern>.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.SelectionItemPatternInformation.SelectionContainer"></xref> property.
This identifier is used by UI Automation providers.
UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern>.
